channel.title: RuneSkill Development Team
channel.description:
[b][size=15pt]RuneSkill...[/size][/b] [i][u]Well i decided to make a development team over the holidays, And try to keep it alive for as long as possible, The team will need a few experienced coders in both Client and Server sides, But the chances of this dev team staying alive for more then 2 weeks are very Slim, So i will try and keep that from happening. [/u][/i]
[b][size=15pt]Want to join?[/size][/b] [u][i]If you want to join, Please fill out the application below, And choose what job you want from the job list, Also below[/i][/u]
[b][size=15pt]Job list[/size][/b]
[b][size=12pt]Client Coders[/size][/b]
-Dog eats dog -Open -Open -Open
[b][size=12pt]Source Coders (Or server coders)[/size][/b]
-Dog eats dog (Not very much, I have *Kind of* quit coding servers, But i will be there to help. -Open -Open -Open
[b][size=12pt]Forum Makers/Website Makers[/size][/b]
[b]Forum Makers[/b] -Dog eats Dog -Open -Open -Open
[b]Website Makers[/b] -Open -Open -Open -Open
[b][size=12pt]Source and Client Testers[/size][/b]
-Open -Open -Open -Open
[b][size=15pt]Forum Positions[/size][/b]
[b]Forum Admin[/b]
-Dog eats dog -Jordan7 -Open -Open
[b] Forum Moderator [/b]
-Open -Open -Open -Open
[b] Forum Vet [/b]
-Open -Open -Open -Open
[b][size=12pt]The Application[/size][/b]
[b] Fill out the information below to join the team [/b]
[code] [b]Job applying for[/b] - [b]Experience in that job [/b] - [b]Proof of that Experience [/b] - [b]Why do you think you will help the team [/b] - [b]Other information[/b] - [/code]
[u][i]I hope we get some good replies, And some experienced members of these forums[/u][/i]

item.title: RuneSkill Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Ksu Ksu
item.description:
@Ksu wrote:

[quote=“Jordan7, post:34, topic:168995”]Guys, Forum Creator is taken.

Kiwon, no offense but we don’t care if you do.[/quote]

[quote=“thomas121794, post:37, topic:168995”]Job applying for -fORUM CREATOR,CODER,FORUM MODERATOR
Experience in that job -Alot, my sig is my forum, have my own server, and im admin on my forum
Proof of that Experience -Alot, my sig is my forum, have my own server, and im admin on my forum
Why do you think you will help the team - My server crashed adn i cant get back up so ill be on alotz
Other information - if oyu need to talk to some ppl about it pm me[/quote]

Thomas, 1) He already stated that forum creater is taken. If you were to apply for anything again I personaly suggest to use correct grammer.

Read full topic

@Runer_King wrote:

Why do you think you will help the team - I am bored lately, and the creation of my new Lava Cave is at a stand still until my staff get back.
[b]Other information - I know I will help a lot. If you want my info, read your messages.[/size]
